content:
SerialData Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of character that was received on the serial port of the SerialPort object.

In this Article

public enum SerialData
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SerialData

Remarks

This enumeration is used with the DataReceived event. You examine the type of character that was received by retrieving the value of the eceivedEventArgs.EventType property of the eceivedEventArgs class. The eceivedEventArgs.EventType property contains one of the values from the SerialData enumeration.

Fields

Chars

A character was received and placed in the input buffer.
Eof

The end of file character was received and placed in the input buffer.
